channel.title: Oh, god that hurts
channel.description:
I got a PK server source from here, completly update it, and i get my friend to log on to try it out, there is nothing nicer than seeing EVERYWHERE is a safe zone, its a completely non-pk server :-(
Has anyone got any good server sources that are PK most of the place...

item.title: Oh, god that hurts
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

You can make your server a pk source, go to tut section and search making pk zones.

Read full topic
